alert.note: Alert for Clay; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 13 at 8:12PM CDT until August 14 at 8:31AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Fishing River near Mosby affecting Ray and Clay Counties. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Fishing River near Mosby. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Fields near Mosby flood and a low-water crossing on west road is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Mon 9pm 12am 3am Fishing River Mosby 18.0 19.5 Sun 7pm 17.3 11.2 6.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
